attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Marraige has very beneficial effects for society and families.
Most children live their whole lives with both natural parents.
This gives a child a stable and loving environment.
However the tax credits favour parents not to marry as they provide more government funding to couples who say they do not live together, but do.
This means the government discriminates against marraige in this country.
Please sign this petition to save marraige which is truly under attack in Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
